mapper.insert:
select uuid()
insert into sys_user (id, sort, username, `password`, nick_name, sex,
credential_code_one, credential_code_two, credential_code_three, police_code, identity_code, system_code_one, system_code_two, system_code_three, phone_one, phone_two, user_id, del_status, `select`, depart_id, default_depart, role_id, `status`, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark1, remark2, remark3 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{credentialCodeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialCodeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialCodeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCodeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCodeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemCodeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{select,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update sys_user
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credential_code_one = #{credentialCodeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credential_code_two = #{credentialCodeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credential_code_three = #{credentialCodeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
police_code = #{policeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_code = #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_code_one = #{systemCodeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_code_two = #{systemCodeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_code_three = #{systemCodeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_one = #{phoneOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_two = #{phoneTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`select` = #{select,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default_depart = #{defaultDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, sort, username, `password`, nick_name, sex, credential_code_one, credential_code_two, credential_code_three, police_code, identity_code, system_code_one, system_code_two, system_code_three, phone_one, phone_two, user_id, del_status, `select`, depart_id, default_depart, role_id, `status`, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark1, remark2, remark3 from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, sort, username, `password`, nick_name, sex, credential_code_one, credential_code_two, credential_code_three, police_code, identity_code, system_code_one, system_code_two, system_code_three, phone_one, phone_two, user_id, del_status, `select`, depart_id, default_depart, role_id, `status`, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark1, remark2, remark3 from sys_user

select id, sort, username, `password`, nick_name, sex, credential_code_one, credential_code_two, credential_code_three, police_code, identity_code, system_code_one, system_code_two, system_code_three, phone_one, phone_two, user_id, del_status, `select`, depart_id, default_depart, role_id, `status`, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark1, remark2, remark3 from sys_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.* from sys_user a where 1=1
and a.depart_id like concat('%',#{depCode},'%')
and a.username like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and a.depart_id = ${departId}
and a.role_id like concat('%',#{roleId},'%')
and a.status = #{status}
and a.del_status=1 ORDER BY a.create_date desc ,id desc

select a.id,a.nick_name AS nic,a.userName,a.role_id as roleId,a.depart_id as depCodes,a.default_depart as depCode, a.phone_one as phone from sys_user a where a.userName = #{userName,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.`password`= #{password,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.del_status=1 and a.status=1

select a.id,a.nick_name AS nic,a.userName,a.role_id as roleId,a.depart_id as depCodes,a.default_depart as depCode, a.phone_one as phone from sys_user a where a.sfzh = #{sfzh,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.del_status=1 and a.status=1
select count(1) from sys_user where role_id like #{roleId}
